original: BLOMBERG, Dag Arvidsson, Gatuinspektör hos Väg- o Vattenb.styr, Saltsjöbaden, f Motala 30/5 99 av överstelöjtn J A B o Gerda Westrell, gm Gullan Dufwa (d). Studex Malmö 18, KTH (V o V) 20—24. Bitr ing å väg- o vattendistr 24—30, extra byråing Väg-o Vattenb.styr 30—34, byråing där 34, sekt.ch h Stat Arb.markn.kommiss 40—43. Led 32 års^ utredn betr beredsk.arb, sakk betr beredsk.-arb 36, led av skärgårdsutredn 38, expert h Investeringsutredningen 43.
translated: BLOMBERG, Dag Arvidsson, Street Inspector at the Road and Water Authority, Saltsjöbaden, born in Motala on May 30, 1899, son of Lieutenant Colonel J A B and Gerda Westrell, married to Gullan Dufwa (deceased). Graduated from Malmö School 1918, Royal Institute of Technology (Road and Water) 1920-1924. Assistant Engineer at the Road and Water District 1924-1930, Extra Clerk at the Road and Water Authority 1930-1934, Clerk there in 1934, Section Chief at the State Labor Market Commission 1940-1943. Led investigations for 32 years regarding emergency work, expert in emergency work in 1936, member of the Archipelago Investigation in 1938, expert in the Investment Investigation in 1943.

structured.name: Dag Arvidsson Blomberg
structured.description: Street Inspector at the Road and Water Authority, Saltsjöbaden. Graduated from Malmö School and Royal Institute of Technology. Worked as an Assistant Engineer, Extra Clerk, Clerk, and Section Chief. Led investigations on emergency work and served as an expert in emergency work.
